OUR INSTITUTE

Why Choose Us?

 Zama Training and Development is committed to:


• Employment equity and the practice of non-discrimination
• Empowerment and skills transfer
• Transparency
• Professional and confidential pre-course evaluations
• Training of the highest quality and standards
• Provisions of our services through competitive market related fees

We Increase participation and interaction between SMME’s

Increase participation and interaction between SMME’s and establish business in a manner that will create awareness of each other’s needs and services and lead to increased SMME market share and effective resource utilization.

We mature and grow existing and aspiring entrepreneurs

Equip individuals and communities with required skills for effective leadership, organizations and the private sector.

We provide communities with assistance to identify and secure funding for projects

Increase safety and health awareness in the work environment and the communities in which we live.

EMPOWER

Empower Your Future

South Africa Is Becoming More Difficult To Find Employment, So Why Don’t You Make A Different Choice & Learn Skills That Will Enable You To Become Your Own Boss.

Contact Us
